name: Gun's STUCK!
description:
Arcade like zombie shooting game. Where the most of the guns cannot stop shooting when the trigger is pulled.

Made for GMTK 2020 gamejam:
This is my first gamejam i've ever joined, also i have never written this bad code before it was an experience to say the least. I enjoyed it and i can't wait next year!
also the name is reference to "Door Stuck" from cs1.6
